video.title: 100 Days Ago I Built a Desert Ecosystem, This Happened

transcript_portions.text: Within this tank lives a miniature world. There are predators and prey, wind and rain.
transcript_portions.speaker: spk_0

transcript_portions.text: This desert is a dangerous place but despite all odds, some animals have evolved to survive. It transformed from an empty wasteland to a thriving ecosystem to understand the mysteries within.
transcript_portions.speaker: spk_0
